memberdef.name: symbolKeymap1
memberdef.initializer: = { {NUMBER_SIGN, DIGIT_ONE, NULL, ASTERISK, NULL, NULL, DIGIT_ZERO}, {DIGIT_TWO, DIGIT_FOUR, DIGIT_FIVE, COMMERCIAL_AT, DIGIT_EIGHT, DIGIT_SEVEN, NULL}, {DIGIT_THREE, SOLIDUS, LEFT_PARENTHESIS, NULL, QUESTION_MARK, DIGIT_NINE, DIGIT_SIX}, {LOW_LINE, COLON, RIGHT_PARENTHESIS, NULL, EXCLAMATION_MARK, COMMA, SEMICOLON}, {PLUS_SIGN, QUOTATION_MARK, HYPHEN_MINUS, NULL, CENT_SIGN, FULL_STOP, APOSTROPHE} }

keyInfo
memberdef.initializer: = {0x00, false, false, false, false, false, false}

memberdef.name: sendData
memberdef.initializer: = {0x00, false, false, false, false, false, false}

memberdef.name: emptyData
memberdef.initializer: = {0x00, false, false, false, false, false, false}

detaileddescription.para: Sends the key data over I2C when requested.

parameterdescription.para: The command to set the brightness (toggle, up, down).

briefdescription.para: Checks if a key was released.

parameterdescription.para: The row index of the key.
The column index of the key.

simplesect.para: true if the key was released, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Checks if a key is being held.

parameterdescription.para: The row index of the key.
The column index of the key.

simplesect.para: true if the key is being held, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Checks if a key was pressed.

parameterdescription.para: The row index of the key.
The column index of the key.

simplesect.para: true if the key was pressed, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Checks if a key is not pressed.

parameterdescription.para: The row index of the key.
The column index of the key.

simplesect.para: true if the key is not pressed, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Checks if a key exists in the keymap.

parameterdescription.para: The row index of the key.
The column index of the key.

simplesect.para: true if the key exists in the keymap, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sets the default character for a key.

detaileddescription.para: Sets keyInfo to the correct character for a specific key, from the default keymap only.

parameterdescription.para: The row index of the key.
The column index of the key.

briefdescription.para: Sets the symbol character for a key.

detaileddescription.para: Sets keyInfo to the correct character for a specific key, from the symbol keymaps only.

parameterdescription.para: The row index of the key.
The column index of the key.

briefdescription.para: Handles the character for a specific key.

parameterdescription.para: The row index of the key.
The column index of the key.

briefdescription.para: Reads the key matrix and updates the key states.
Sends the key information over I2C.
Implementation of keyboard functions and keymaps.
